title: 'Worst packaging of Flite company slippers'
body: 'I bought a pair of Flite slippers and packaging was ridiculous..there were slippers in amazon polythene packet without any box....i was disappointed..who knows if it is already used..can we imagine this type of worst packaging of Flite Company.'

title: 'Worth buying this footwear.'

title: 'Product is good'
body: 'Product is good but packaging is poor.'

title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'Light weight and feel very comfortable to wear it'

title: 'So much comfortable and so light weighted'
body: These are the best slippers I've ever wore in my entire life. These are so comfortable, soft and very light weighted and you won't even feel you're wearing these. Trust me, I'm sure you can find many soft, comfortable and light weighted slippers in the market but hardly any for around Rs.350. I got so obsessed over these slippers the moment I put these on. No doubt the slippers from FLITE are so good for people with less budget like me.  Just go for these without any second thoughts in case you're looking for casual and everyday wear slippers with a budget of around Rs.350.  Good day!

title: 'Price very high'
body: 'These slippers are very soft and awesome. but price very high. Because I bought first time in Amazon ₹250 in. But second time I bought only ₹200 in market.'

title: 'Very soft and light weight.'
body: The media could not be loaded. I wanted soft slippers and these slippers did not disappoint. But the size is a bit off. So if you wear Size 8 then order Size 9. Rest it's very good. The quality is good. It will serve for a long time.
